get.description:
List all pending facility applications
GET /admin/facilities/pending/

GET /auth/csrf/
Returns a CSRF token cookie

Get or update current user profile
GET/PUT /auth/profile/

put.description:
Get or update current user profile
GET/PUT /auth/profile/

patch.description:
Get or update current user profile
GET/PUT /auth/profile/

get.description:
List current user's bookings with filtering
GET /bookings/v1/my-bookings/

Get booking statistics for the current user
GET /bookings/v1/stats/

List courts for a facility
GET /facilities/{facility_id}/courts/

Get details for a specific court
GET /facilities/courts/{court_id}/

List availability for a court
GET /facilities/courts/{court_id}/availability/

List all facilities owned by the manager
GET /api/manager/facilities/

Get or update a facility owned by the manager
GET/PUT /api/manager/facilities/{id}/

put.description:
Get or update a facility owned by the manager
GET/PUT /api/manager/facilities/{id}/

patch.description:
Get or update a facility owned by the manager
GET/PUT /api/manager/facilities/{id}/

get.description:
Get all courts for a facility owned by the manager
GET /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/

put.description:
Update a court for a facility owned by the manager
PUT/PATCH /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/

patch.description:
Update a court for a facility owned by the manager
PUT/PATCH /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/

get.description:
Get all availability for a specific court owned by the manager
GET /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/availability/

put.description:
Update availability slot for a court owned by the manager
PUT/PATCH /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/availability/{availability_id}/

patch.description:
Update availability slot for a court owned by the manager
PUT/PATCH /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/availability/{availability_id}/

delete.description:
Delete availability slot for a court owned by the manager
DELETE /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/availability/{availability_id}/

post.description:
Bulk create availability slots for a court
POST /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/availability/bulk/

Body: {
    "start_date": "2025-10-23",
    "end_date": "2025-11-23",
    "days_of_week": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5],  # Monday=1, Sunday=7
    "start_time": "10:00",
    "end_time": "22:00",
    "slot_duration_minutes": 60
}

Create new availability slot for a court owned by the manager
POST /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/availability/

patch.description:
Delete or deactivate a court for a facility owned by the manager
DELETE /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/delete/?permanent=true - Hard delete
PATCH /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/delete/ - Soft delete (deactivate)

delete.description:
Delete or deactivate a court for a facility owned by the manager
DELETE /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/delete/?permanent=true - Hard delete
PATCH /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/{court_id}/delete/ - Soft delete (deactivate)

post.description:
Create a new court for a facility owned by the manager
POST /api/manager/facilities/{facility_id}/courts/

get.description:
Get manager dashboard overview with booking statistics
GET /api/manager/overview/

OpenApi3 schema for this API. Format can be selected via content negotiation.

- YAML: application/vnd.oai.openapi
- JSON: application/vnd.oai.openapi+json

availability_start_date.description: Date from which availability is generated

TimezoneEnum.description:
* `Australia/Sydney` - Sydney (NSW, ACT)
* `Australia/Melbourne` - Melbourne (VIC)
* `Australia/Brisbane` - Brisbane (QLD)
* `Australia/Adelaide` - Adelaide (SA)
* `Australia/Perth` - Perth (WA)
* `Australia/Hobart` - Hobart (TAS)
* `Australia/Darwin` - Darwin (NT)
